src:
Kongres PSSI: La Nyalla Absen, 9 Calon Ketua PSSI Lain Datang
01 Nov 2019, 09:23 by Antara, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Sembilan calon ketua PSSI periode 2019-2023 berkomitmen hadir di kongres pemilihan PSSI. Jadwal kongres luar biasa (KLB) PSSI rencananya digelar 2 November 2019 di Jakarta.
Juru bicara sembilan calon ketua PSSI tersebut, Fary Djemy Francis, mengatakan akan datang di kongres. “Kami akan mengikuti kongres tanggal 2 November besok. Namun kami berharap pemerintah dan FIFA memastikan kongres berjalan sesuai Statuta FIFA,” kata Fary, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Meski demikian, Fary tidak bisa memastikan apakah delapan kandidat ketua PSSI dapat menjalani dan mengakui hasil kongres. “Semua tergantung dinamika yang terjadi dari kongres itu setiap menitnya,” sebut Fary.
Sementara kandidat lainnya, La Nyalla Mattalitti, menegaskan tidak akan datang ke kongres PSSI. Menurut dia, kongres yang sah digelar pada Januari 2020 sesuai dengan kesepakatan awal dan arahan FIFA bukannya pada 2 November 2019.
Di kongres PSSI nanti, total ada 11 calon yang akan memperebutkan kursi ketua umum PSSI periode 2019-2023. Mereka adalah Arif Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Bernhard Limbong, Benny Erwin, Fary Djemy Francis. Lalu, La Nyalla Mattalitti, Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim Soekasah, Sarman El Hakim, Vijaya Fitriyasa, dan Yesayas Oktavianus.
Selain memilih posisi ketua, kongres pemilihan juga akan menunjuk 15 personil Komite Eksekutif (Exco) PSSI 2019-2023, yaitu dua wakil ketua umum dan 12 anggota exco. Kongres dijadwalkan digelar di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta.
text:
PSSI Congress: La Nyalla Absent, 9 Other Prospective PSSI Chairmen Come
Nov 1, 2019, 09:23 by Antara, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Nine candidates for the chairman of the PSSI 2019-2023 are committed to attend the PSSI election congress. The schedule for the PSSI extraordinary congress (KLB) is planned to be held on November 2, 2019 in Jakarta.
Spokesman for the nine PSSI chairmen, Fary Djemy Francis, said he would come to the congress. "We will attend the congress on November 2 tomorrow. But we hope that the government and FIFA ensure that the congress runs according to the FIFA Statute, "Fary said, Friday, November 1, 2019.
However, Fary could not confirm whether the eight PSSI chair candidates could undergo and acknowledge the results of the congress. "All depends on the dynamics that occur from the congress every minute," said Fary.
While other candidates, La Nyalla Mattalitti, emphasized that he would not come to the PSSI congress. According to him, a legitimate congress was held in January 2020 in accordance with the initial agreement and direction of FIFA rather than on 2 November 2019.
In the PSSI congress later, there are a total of 11 candidates who will compete for the chair of the PSSI general chair for the 2019-2023 period. They are Arif Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Bernhard Limbong, Benny Erwin, Fary Djemy Francis. Then, La Nyalla Mattalitti, Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim Soekasah, Sarman El Hakim, Vijaya Fitriyasa, and Yesayas Oktavianus.
In addition to electing the position of chairman, the election congress will also appoint 15 PSSI 2019-2023 Executive Committee (Exco) personnel, namely two deputy chairmen and 12 exco members. The congress is scheduled to be held at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta.
